content: ambitus this is a one size only pattern but you can easily change the circumference of the neck warmer smaller casting on fewer stitches the only thing important to keep in mind is that the number of the stitches must be dividable by four needles 3 5 mm and 4 mm circulars or suitable for your yarn and gauge yarn and yardage about 230 meters 110 - 120 grams of worsted or dk weight yarn gauge 18 - 19 st and 28 row is 4 in/10 cm in stockinette stitch with needles 4 mm using 3 5 mm needles cast on 116 stitches join and k1 p1 till height is 14 cm or more if you want a longer neck part change to 4 mm needles and start increasings 1 row *k1 p1 k1 p1 increase one stitch picking up the horizontal thread between two stitches and purl through the back of the loop* repeat to the end of the row 2 row *k1 p1 k1 p2* repeat to the end of the row 3 row *k1 p1 increase one stitch picking up the horizontal thread between two stitches and purl through the back of the loop k1 p2* repeat to the end of the row 4 - 7 row *k1 p2* repeat to the end of the row 8 row *k1 p2 k1 p2 increase one stitch picking up the horizontal thread between two stitches and knit through the back of the loop* repeat to the end of the row 9 - 13 row *k1 p2 k1 p2 k1* repeat to the end of the row 14 row *k1 p2 increase one stitch picking up the horizontal thread between two stitches and knit through the back of the loop k1 p2 k1* repeat to the end of the row 15 - 20 row *k1 p2 k2 p2 k1* repeat to the end of the row 21 row *k1 p2 k2 p2 increase one stitch picking up the horizontal thread between two stitches and knit through the back of the loop k1* repeat to the end of the row 22 - 28 row *k1 p2 k2 p2 k2* repeat to the end of the row 29 row *k1 p2 increase one stitch picking up the horizontal thread between two stitches and knit through the back of the loop k2 p2 k2* repeat to the end of the row 30 - 37 row *k1 p2 k3 p2 k2* repeat to the end of the row cast off turn over and wear thank you for choosing my pattern this pattern is for personal use only and may not be reproduced for commercial purposes without permission lankakomero blogspot com * lankakomero@netti fi * ravelry id lankakomero ©pm lankakomero 2007-2008 * all rights reserved
